body.name: Usoway Spy Camera Hidden Camera,WiFi Mini Nanny Cam Wireless Camera for Home Office Security,Pet Dog Camera Indoor Outdoor Baby Camera，Secret House Camera with Motion Detection Night Vision
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 17 - 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: [Ultra Small Camera]:2023 latest design mini portable camera for indoor/outdoor. It’s smallest wifi camera. Once your iPhone or Android phone configured with router Wi-Fi. Then you can view live video on the App remotely from anywhere in the world. Protect your family and your home investment from would-be burglars with security camera.

[Latest Smart Camera]:This small camera is portable, which makes it perfect for use as a wireless home security camera or housekeeper/nanny cam/baby monitor with a camera to record snapshot pictures and videos without drawing any attention. In addition, it can be used as a car camera, dog/pet camera, baby monitor or air action camera

[Enhanced Motion Detection Technology ]:WIFI camera with the upgraded intelligent motion detection, you can set the sensor sensitivity manually. Quickly finds human targets and immediately sends a notification to you. Smart Tracking function makes the camera follows moving objects, records real-time videos and sends instant alerts to you.

[Upgraded HD Night Vision]:Night vision camera uses advanced HD lens and 2 independent 940nm IR LEDs, the IR light does not light up when recording, it will not expose the camera position, the night vision distance is 26 ft, you can clearly see what is happening in low light or even total darkness. So you can see if someone is breaking into your home or business with the HD wireless camera, even when the lights are off.
[Easy to Use]:Set up in minutes turn on the mini camera, connect to wifi and add it to the application. Designed for you to set up easily. No wiring required, no complicated installation.
body.description: If you have any questions about the camera, you can contact us at any time, and professional technicians will teach you the operation 24 hours a day. If there is a quality problem, please contact us as soon as possible, and we will handle it for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars No charger cord
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Came with no charger cord no instructions looks to be used very disappointing…..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I'm not quite getting the connection right.
reviews.reviewText: It easy to assemble, just hard to navigate. The internet connection is throwing me off; one minute its connected, and then in the next moment it's offline. I'm hoping YouTube has a tutorial for me to watch. Other than that, the video is clear and seems to get a wide range view.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars How to link it to my phone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars BEWARE!! Does not really have 4.5 stars!!!
reviews.reviewText: My sister bought this to set up in our elderly parent's home because it showed 4.5 stars but unfortunately she didn't look at the reviews. This camera is basically a piece of crap that is cheaply made and the app is useless. It wouldn't connect and the camera itself wouldn't stay on. All of the "good" reviews are for completely different products and the reviews that are actually for this camera are 1 star. People gotta do their homework when looking at reviews!! The company is being very deceitful!!
